module.name: DISA
module.description: DISA Allows you 'Direct Inward System Access'. This gives you the ability to have an option on an IVR that gives you a dial tone, and you're able to dial out from the freePBX machine as if you were connected to a standard extension. It appears as a Destination.
module.changelog: *2.2.2.2* #2172 deprecated use of |, changed category *2.2.2.1* bump for rc1 *2.2.2* bump so higher that 2.2 branch *2.2* First release for FreePBX 2.2 - Fixed compatibility issue with new UI
